comment: It is an easy A and makes your day a lot better.

Prof. Boyer is a great professor. Very easy and enjoyable class. If I could take this class every semester I would. No real homework assignments. Just come with a mindful breath and positive attitude. No textbook. 1 exam, very easy.
Enjoyed this class! Very relaxing and Mrs. Boyer is such a sweet lady as well! :)
Easy A
Great professor and class
An amazing professor! Absolutely would take her again. So caring and sweet!
10/10: favorite class ever. i adore yoga and mrs. boyer.

For tests and assignments, no surprises. She will go over everything you need to know ahead of time.

Helpful in the physical part as well. Helps to make sure students don't injure themselves, while getting the most out of practice.

Ms. Shell is an AMAZING professor! If I could take her again I absolutely would. She has introduced me to something new and taught me things that I will carry with me forever. Class participation is extremely important. There is 1 written exam. As long as you are making an effort you will get the grade you want.

Prof. Boyer did an amazing job teaching the whole class yoga, I feel like the two times I went a week were always the highlight of my week. I would recommend anyone who has 15 credit hours take this class for free.
She is very nice and will help you pass the class as long as you show up and do the activities.
She really cares about your grade and attendance in a good way. Exercises might be a bit tough, but you will enjoy
This is an amazing class that all college students should take! It has eased so much of my stress and anxiety and she is an amazing teacher. Shell, we will miss you so much!

Professor Boyer is awesome! She took time and explained the yoga poses and assisted us if we weren't doing the pose correctly. She is so sweet and responds back to emails very quickly. We had one test and she went through each question that was on the test during our test review. 15/10 recommend taking her!

Shell Boyer is an amazing yoga teacher, she truly wants you to know the true meaning of yoga and to understand the poses. She takes the time to adjust when needed and she makes sure that you never feel judged for doing a pose wrong. I would highly recommend taking her if possible!

One of my most favorite professors I have had yet, but definitely the most inspirational I have had. She is so kind, caring, and very passionate about yoga. She really truly cares about everyone in the class as an individual. So sad it's her last year teaching but honored to be in her last class here. LOVED Mrs. Boyer!!!
Took her for yoga. She was excellent and really cares about her class.

Mrs. Boyer was a great teacher to have for yoga! Shes really caring, funny, and gives good feedback. Shes a great professor to have if youre new to yoga. Textbook was optional is is by no means required.
rating_tags: Caring--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Shes awesome! She cares a lot for her students.

Great beginners yoga class, i would definitely recommend if you're looking to take an elective or just an easy class. Professor is very caring and wants you to pass the class. Does require an outside yoga class. Overall really enjoyed the practice.

This class is so enjoyable! Shes so nice and helpful. Theres no kind of pressure to be advanced with skills but she gives a lot of opportunity to learn about bodily wellness in yoga! It was a nice, relaxing class. Dont hesitate to take this with her!!
Fun class, learned a lot about yoga, was challenging at times but it was not a hard class, highly recommend!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Absolutely love her!!! She is so wise and inspirational. She teaches you things on and off the mat. Could not recommend a class/professor more.

Prof. Boyer is an amazing yoga instructor. She is very kind and cares a lot about her students. She requires you to be in class each day for participation. The class is very fun, relaxing and insightful. If youre looking for a place to let off some steam, pain, this is the class for you!
She was a great yoga instructor, make sure you show up to class and there arent many assignments so do them and turn them in on time!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She was really a great teacher, she takes her class seriously. If you dont, you wont pass. I didnt at first, but her true passion for the class and teaching really opened my eyes to yoga and allowed me to enjoy the class. You will learn a lot about being calm and how to relax. Overall, a great class!
rating_tags: Respected--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She was a very good teacher to learn Yoga from the only thing that I did not like was that the class was so short.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Professor Boyer is amazing! She genuinely wants everyone to be the best version of themselves throughout their time in this class. Its an easy A if you show up and participate! She doesnt ask much of her students, and I would definitely take her again.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: You will pass if you show up and only a few other assignments go toward your grade. If you are new to yoga, she is a great instructor and encourages her students to learn more and not be scared to try new poses!

I loved this class. I started doing yoga over the summer and Prof. Boyer helped me get more comfortable with the practice and relax during my last semester. Very beginner friendly, just show up to class and pay attention. Assignments: 2 easy observation logs, an easy quiz and an easy observation report.
Very beginning friendly! Would take again.
This was such an enjoyable class! I learned a lot about myself. This yoga class made my semester wayyyyyyy less stressful and yet I learned so much!

Shes great. Its more of a hands on class/practice based class but she does teach towards the beginning about the history of yoga and other stuff. Its a very fun class. 1 written exam, 1 healthy eating quiz, and practice logs. Super easyyy. But attendance MANDATORY.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Boyers expectations are very clear. If you show up every class and practice you should do well. There are also a few assignments that are done outside of class but they are not challenging. Attendance is mandatory but the classes are very pleasant!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: This class is so much fun and such an easy A. She pushes you to do your best in yoga but only cares that you are trying your best. She has a witty sense of humor & will for sure make you laugh. Very encouraging and caring. She also is understanding. Just communicate with her! I definitely recommend this class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I really enjoyed this class with Mrs. Boyer. She is so nice & excellent at yoga. I will miss taking this class bc of the relaxation I felt during and after! I wish I could take it again!
Great professor, there is a lot of work to be done in the class. It is not just yoga.
She does give assignments that are very tedious but its not something you cant do last minute.
Make sure your on time and participate.
It was an easy class, but attendance is required

This class was amazing I really enjoyed it , its easy to pass you have to actually try showing effort and being positive ! This class attendance is mandatory so make sure to show up ! The professor was amazing very helpful and understanding I would definitely take this again .
Love her! Great yoga teacher and would definitely pay to attend an outside yoga class if she taught one!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Really good teacher

A really great teacher. Especially when learning the basics of yoga. She teaches you to practice without any judgement. Attendance is a part of your grade but its a really relaxing class. Definitely recommend!

Super caring teacher. Gives you everything you need to do good in the class. Gets you ready for other classes, or even just at home yoga, with the information she provides. I definitely recommend if you are interested in learning yoga basics. Loved having her and seeing how passionate she is about yoga.
A very informational, beginner level class. The professor is helpful and promotes students to practice at their own level
wonderful yoga teacher. She makes me want to come to class because her teachings are so helpful and peaceful. Its very beginner friendly.
A really sweet professor, willing to work with you. Makes everything very simple to learn so you dont feel behind or anything
Expert level instructor. Made the student work. A great class for introducing someone to Yoga.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Tough grader

comment: This class was very calming and helped me a lot along with my professor doing an amazing job at teaching yoga
Professor Boyer is really nice and encouraging. I enjoyed taking her class! Also her voice is really calming .
This was a really good class and she teaches you new ways to relax and exercise. She does a good balance of both.
rating_tags: Respected--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Very intense with her yoga practice but she wants you to learn and succeed
Great yoga teacher. Talks well through lectures and very caring.

Very easy and simple class. Very clear on how you will be graded from the first day of class. She gives plenty of opportunities for extra credit. Attendance does matter so show up to practice your poses. Overall, a very informative and simple yoga class. Anyone should get an A if you put in a little effort.
She really gives everyone an opportunity to participate in the class and as long as you show up and do the assignments which arent much the class is very doable
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: The class is an easy pass. In the beginning, she tells you as long as you attend the class and participate with a good attitude, you will pass. This is true, and her class is very relaxing.
Fun and easy class. Attendance is mandatory, and grade is mainly participation points with a few assignments.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: Amazing teacher and very relaxing class
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: A very relaxing class. This class helps manage your stress and become confident in yourself.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: She expects you to participate and earn your grade. She gives many opportunities to complete and prepare for tests/projects. Loved this class!
Good makes me relax

I found this class to be very enjoyable. It is definitely more work than I anticipated but if you come to every class it's an easy A. The professor takes the class seriously and expects you to as well but she is not pushy and is always willing to help.

I really enjoyed Professor Boyers yoga class! I was surprised to read other reviews where it talked about textbook work. We didnt use any sort of text book, and while she does ask you to pay attention, the class is very easy, and helped me relax more in daily life. We did practice yoga every class, so be prepared to stretch and move!

Dont take this class if youre looking for an easy A. I do believe Shell wants every student to grow as much as possible, but she takes it very seriously. 1 free absence, and 4 absences are an automatic fail. You have to attend an outside yoga class but the assignment is easy. By the end of the class you will come out more skilled and aware.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Boyer is very understanding. She knows exactly what she is talking about and expects you to put forth the effort in each class. Be on time and pay attention when she mentions important topics before and after class.
She teaches you the importance of being in the moment and letting go of stress. She definitely inspired me to continue practicing yoga.

Her class was very insightful. I learned about more than just practicing yoga. The best take away for me was how yoga can be taken off the mat into your everyday life. I enjoyed learning how to mindful breathe and calm down.
This was my first time taking a yoga class and I loved it! Professor Boyer is really respectful.
She was very helpful and understanding
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Wow! I don't even know where to begin with this lady. This professor takes the class way too seriously and focuses on classwork more than actual yoga. The worst thing about her is if a student does something incorrect, this professor acts childish and makes faces towards students. Boyer is good at yoga but an AWFUL and IMMATURE instructor.

Boyer takes this 1 credit hour class wayyy too seriously! There was more book work and assignments than actual "yoga" time. Attendance is mandatory, must buy the book, and you must attend a yoga class outside of KSU as an assignment or you get dropped a whole letter grade!! I would NOT take this class if you just want an easy A!
